availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Richard J. Sparks (Oldham County, Kentucky farmer and soldier)

body.p: Oldham County, Kentucky farmer and soldier. Oldham County native. Married to Mildred A. Rouce Sparks in 1859. Father of John Sparks and Emma Sparks. Farmer in Oldham County in 1860. Captain in Captain Sparks Company. Oldham County State Guard, served September 17, 1862 to October 31, 1862.

ab.bibl:

Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 2, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), 856
Find A Grave, "Capt Richard J Sparks (1832-1864)," Memorial #72781290, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/72781290 (accessed December 3, 2018).
